section_title: Pensions of Prime Minister and Speaker.
Pensions for dependants of Prime Minister or Speaker.
Annuity premiums of Ministers and other office-holders.

section_text: 35 1 In this Act, except in so far as the context otherwise requires, the following expressions have the meanings hereby assigned to them respectively, that is to say— “ the Act of 1965 ” means the  Ministerial Salaries and Members’ Pensions Act 1965; . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . “ the Consolidated Fund ” means the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom; . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . “ enactment ” includes an enactment of the Parliament of Northern Ireland; . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 2 Except in so far as the context otherwise requires, any reference in this Act to an enactment shall be construed as a reference to that enactment as amended or extended by or under any other enactment.
